title: Make detect point consistency
body:
Make DetectPoint in Mesh gRPC protocol, DetectPoint in Source, and SpanSrcType convert to each other right. In old codes, enum SpanSrcType#Entry and DetectPoint#Server in Source have different enum value, but the current codes assume they are same which causes numberOfService incorrect.

Manually trigger agent registration and write registration status to file

- The reset.status file generated at startup is as follows
> #Status has three values: ON (trigger reset), DONE(reset complete ), OFF(agent fist boot).
#Application_id: application_id of the current agent.
#Instance_id: the instanceid of the current agent.
#Tue Sep 11 19:56:44 CST 2018
status=OFF
application_id=0
instance_id=0

```

	at org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.TaskThread$WrappingRunnable.run(TaskThread.java:61)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
```

example code
ParentController.java
```java
@RestController
@RequestMapping("parent")
public class ParentController {

    @GetMapping("a")
    public String a(Integer b) {
        return "parent-a" + b;
    }
}
```
ChildController.java
```java
@RestController
@RequestMapping("child")
public class ChildController extends ParentController {

}
```

 ## Without Agent
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11530760/45133442-c49c8380-b1c7-11e8-9ecd-fb8217212fc7.png)

## With Agent

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11530760/45133448-d54cf980-b1c7-11e8-9c7b-8259bc81e684.png)

will reproduce this error
- How to fix?

For the root reason is  bytebuddy enhace bytecode by enhancing some methods which is not declared by the own Class( some from parent Class),so spring will get wrong method name in RequestMapping.so the solution is making method enhancement is declared by current Class(TypeDescription in bytebuddy)
___
### New feature or improvement
- Describe the details and related test reports.

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Something isn't working and you are sure it's a bug!

title: Fix wrong interceptor class names.
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting pull request

- Why submit this pull request?
- [ #1573 ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature provided
- [ ] Improve performance

- Related issues

___
### Bug fix
- Bug description.

the java classes naming is mixed.
MotanProviderInstrumentation-->com.weibo.api.motan.rpc.AbstractReferer
MotanConsumerInstrumentation-->com.weibo.api.motan.transport.ProviderMessageRouter
Named reverse.

Even no functional issue, naming is making people confused. Need to be fixed.


- How to fix?
Just rename the class name MotanConsumerInstrumentation and MotanProviderInstrumentation.

___
### New feature or improvement

title: [merge commits require]Sync 6.0 to master
body:
In one month development of 6.0, the skeleton is ready. I am syncing branch 6.0 to master branch. 

From now
- All PRs of features about 6.0 should be sent to **master** branch directly. 
- All PRs of features about 5.x and further release should be sent to **5.x** branch.
- If the PR fits both, send both.

Notice, This pr includes many people's works, not just me. Require to do **merge commits**, don't do `squash merging**.

Thanks.

     Replace the pr #1605

1. Create SWHystrixPluginsWrapperCache for recording the SWExecutionHookWrapper and SWHystrixConcurrencyStrategyWrapper object. 
2. Store SWHystrixPluginsWrapperCache in EnhancedInstance#dynamicField. 
3. One SWHystrixPluginsWrapperCache attach one EnhancedInstance.

title: fix bug: memory leak caused by using unique instances of HystrixCon
body:
currencyStrategy instead of a single instance

Please answer these questions before submitting pull request

- Why submit this pull request?
- [ * ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature provided
- [ ] Improve performance

- Related issues

#1604

___
### Bug fix
- Bug description.

app print log info: Over 100 instances of HystrixRequestVariable are being stored. This is likely the sign of a memory leak caused by using unique instances of HystrixConcurrencyStrategy instead of a single instance.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5206798/44790014-b9969180-abd0-11e8-81ca-b8eb8c02356d.png)


- How to fix?

create one instance of HystrixConcurrencyStrategy and save it, then get the one if needed, not new one instance every time.
___
### New feature or improvement
- Describe the details and related test reports.

title: Re-adds maven wrapper downloader so users won't crash if wget is missing
body:
- Why submit this pull request?
- [x] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature provided
- [ ] Improve performance

- Related issues
#1574
___
### Bug fix
#1574 removed the maven wrapper jar. The shell script will try wget and then this
downloader if missing. It is very likely in windows and small vms for
people to not have wget installed, so this will prevent support problems
(and is why the wrapper includes this)
